short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write and send messages on WhatsApp Web using your voice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your voice into text on WhatsApp Web with the WhatsApp Voice to Text Bot. This Chrome extension uses voice recognition to dictate and send messages. Easily activate or deactivate with an ON/OFF button. Perfect for users who prefer speaking over typing or have problems with the keyboard. Also includes donation options and an Android version.
--->Remember to refresh the website once installed.<---
